sentences.en: As companies become disembodied into some Barlowian cyberspace, they take on the character of software.
sentences.cn: 当各种公司取消实体进入某种巴洛式的赛博空间之后, 它们就具有了某种类似于软件的特色.

sentences.en: Disembodied Hand: Detach one of your hands and send it forth to manipulate objects or attack.
sentences.cn: 无形之手: 切离你的一只手,并驱使它去操纵物体或战斗.

sentences.en: Disembodied voices could be heard in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗中听见了人声,却看不见人影.

sentences.en: I blinked rapidly – but casually – and stepped forward through the disembodied door frame.
sentences.cn: 我迅速眨着眼睛-但是很平常-向前进了门.

sentences.en: The troops were disembodied after the war.

words.tran_cn: 空洞的；无实质的；无实体的

trans.tran_cn: （灵魂）脱离肉体的，脱离实体的，无身体的，不具形体的
trans.tran_en: existing without a body or separated from a body
